name: IGBrokerage
description: IG Markets is a leading global CFD and spread betting provider with access to forex, indices, commodities, cryptocurrencies, and equities.

authentication.description: IG Markets uses API key authentication with CST and X-SECURITY-TOKEN session tokens

fields.name: ig-api-url
fields.label: API URL
fields.help: Use https://demo-api.ig.com/gateway/deal for demo, https://api.ig.com/gateway/deal for live

fields.name: ig-api-key
fields.label: API Key
fields.help: Get your API key from https://labs.ig.com/

fields.name: ig-account-id
fields.label: Account ID
fields.help: Optional: Specify account ID for multi-account users

fields.name: ig-environment
fields.label: Environment
fields.help: Choose demo for testing or live for real trading

streaming.description: Real-time data via Lightstreamer WebSocket protocol

non-trading.description: 60 non-trading requests (quotes, history, account) per minute

limitations.tick-data: Tick resolution not supported, minimum resolution is Minute
limitations.guaranteed-stops: Guaranteed stops require additional configuration in IG platform
limitations.options: Option chains not implemented in current version

notes: IG Markets uses EPIC codes for instrument identification
Stop-loss and take-profit orders are specified via order tags (e.g., 'SL:1.1000;TP:1.2000')
CFD/Index/Equity orders have 0.1% commission (minimum Â£10 GBP)
Demo accounts are available for testing at https://www.ig.com/uk/demo-account
API key must be obtained from https://labs.ig.com/ before use
